CustomField.formula: IF( company_id__r.Min_1_Shop_has_SI__c >0 && Zuora_Expected_Turnover__c < turnover_by_average_basket__c , turnover_by_average_basket__c, IF(company_id__r.Min_1_Shop_has_SI__c =0 && Zuora_Expected_Turnover__c < turnover_by_average_shopping_basket__c , turnover_by_average_shopping_basket__c, 0) )
CustomField.label: Lift forecast value
